---
title: "Zotero Library"
---

## Overview

Zotero manages our scientific literature for both general reference and expedition-specific needs.

## Organization

- Main library with shared access
- Collections organized by:
  - Expeditions
  - Research methods
  - Ecosystems
  - Geographic regions

## Workflow

- Add references with browser extension
- Organize into appropriate collections
- Add PDFs when available
- Use consistent tagging system
- Export citations for manuscripts
